snippet.title: SNAKE ESCAPE with Adley Niko & Navey!!  Find hidden keys while playing Hide n Seek in Granny's house
snippet.description:
Navey is a crazy snake!!

JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

HEY EVERYBODY!! It's almost time for bed, pick one more thing to do! And we chose... some late night Roblox games! Adley, Niko & Navey chose to play this super fun Snakey game on Roblox with Dad where one person turns into a giant snake and has to hunt down everyone else while they search for keys and try to escape! First up, Adley was the snake! Niko is a huge fan of this game so he was super good at juking out Adley and whoever was the snake! Adley was pretty good, but not good enough and Niko, Navey and Dad got away! But, next up Navey was the snake and she was actually super good! She kept getting Niko over and over! Only Adley got away because Navey got Niko and Dad at the very end! After that, we were getting sleepy and ready for bed but we decided to play just one more game! We played some classic Roblox Natural Disaster Survival! It's always a good time for us to try and make it through some tornados, tsunamis and earthquakes! After that though, it really was time to go to bed!

Thanks for Watching!! BYE! PSSSSSSSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video: Creativity can be CRAZY!! Adley & Niko make a Spacestation Town craft from Crunchlabs Creative Kit
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nHFSHdXm3CM


this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
